arts.ttl: Michael Carrick gives Middlesbrough injury and transfer update amid Emmanuel Latte Lath concern
arts.sum: Michael Carrick admits that he hopes Emmanuel Latte Lath will not be out for an extended period after picking up a groin injury during Saturday's 2-1 defeat at Preston North End . "He felt his groin, how badly and to what extent, I don't know," said the Boro boss.

arts.ttl: Emil Riis wins it for Preston at Middlesbrough’s away-day troubles continue
arts.sum: The winner came with a little over 10 minutes to go.

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough seal George Edmundson return on a permanent basis after successful loan
arts.sum: Boro were keen to secure Edmundson's long-term future and bring him back to the Riverside after Ipswich Town recalled him from his loan on Tuesday. Middlesbrough have secured the permanent signing of George Edmundson after his successful loan spell.

arts.ttl: Hayden Hackney's growth at Middlesbrough under Michael Carrick and one trait that's never changed
arts.sum: “He’s definitely grown a lot in that time, and developed,” Carrick said of the homegrown star. The Boro boss said: I think it’s more just getting yourself in the right positions.

Preston had striker Milutin Osmajic to thank on Tuesday night as his brace helped to seal a 2-1 away win against an out-of-form Watford side. That victory quelled any fears of a slide towards the rele...
Plymouth Argyle forward Morgan Whittaker joins Championship rivals Middlesbrough.

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough secure eye-catching Championship transfer as Morgan Whittaker joins from Plymouth
arts.sum: An eye-catching deal, Boro were able to complete the signing of one of the Championship's top forwards in recent years after selling Isaiah Jones to Luton Town earlier this month to free up funds. Having starred on loan in the Pilgrims side that won promotion from League One in 2023, Whittaker made his move to Home Park permenant and had an excellent first season in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Middlesbrough target second Plymouth Argyle star after successful Morgan Whittaker bid
arts.sum: Middlesbrough are showing an interest in Plymouth Argyle full-back Bali Mumba, reporter Graeme Bailey has said. Middlesbrough are… The post Middlesbrough target second Plymouth Argyle star after successful Morgan Whittaker bid appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Liverpool loanee Ben Doak opens up on his aims as Middlesbrough stay is confirmed with a goal
arts.sum: And speaking to club media after the West Brom win to set out his aims now his immediate future is clear, Doak said: “I’ve been practicing that kind of finish in training and luckily it’s paid off. But after scoring a stunning goal in Tuesday night's victory over West Brom to send Boro back into the top six, it was confirmed that the deadline allowing Liverpool to recall had passed, meaning Doak will stay at the Riverside until the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Fee emerges as Middlesbrough strike permanent deal for 27-year-old
arts.sum: Middlesbrough will pay an initial £600,000 to sign George Edmundson permanent but add-ons could more than double the… The post Fee emerges as Middlesbrough strike permanent deal for 27-year-old appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
